segments.text: Hi , I have a reservation under the name of Sandals .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could I see your ID , please , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course ! Let me take it out of my wallet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , sir . Now , do you have a credit card , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course . Is American Express okay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir . Only VISA or MasterCard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In that case , here's my VISA .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Your room number is 507 , queen bed , nonsmoking . Is that agreeable to you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good . Here is your room key , sir . If you need anything at all , please dial 0 .
segments.speaker: S2
